Verses: 1 nyaayancheygira Manushanaik Kandupidippeergalo Endrum, Saththiyaththaith Thedugiravan Undo Endrum, Erusalemin Therukkalile Thirindhupaarththu, Visaariththu, Adhin Veedhigalile Thedungal; Kaanbeergalaanaal Adharku Mannipputh Tharuven.
2 avargal: Karththarudaiya Jeevanaikkondu Sollugirom Endraalum, Poiyaanaiyidugiraargale.

3 karththaave, Ummudaiya Kangal Saththiyaththai Allavo Nokkugindradhu; Avargalai Adikkireer, Aanaalum Avargalukku Nogaadhu; Avargalai Nirmoolamaakkugireer, Aanaalum Buththiyai Etrukkollamaattom Engiraargal; Thangal Mugangalaik Kanmalaiyaippaarkkilum Kettiyaakki, Thirumbamaattom Engiraargal.
4 appozhudhu Naan: Ivargal Neesaraame, Ivargal Madhiyatravargal; Karththarudaiya Vazhiyaiyum, Thangal Dhevanudaiya Nyaayaththaiyum Ariyaadhirukkiraargal Endrum;

5 naan Periyorgalidaththile Poi, Avargalode Pesuven; Avargal Karththarudaiya Vazhiyaiyum, Thangal Dhevanudaiya Nyaayaththaiyum Arivaargalendrum Sonnen; Avargalo Egamaai Nugaththadiyai Muriththu, Kattugalai Aruththuppottaargal.

6 aagaiyaal Kaattilirundhu Varum Singam Avargalaik Kollum, Vanaandharaththilulla Onaaigal Avargalaip Peerum, Sivingi Avargal Pattanangalinmel Nokkamaayirukkum; Avaigalilirundhu Purappadugiravan Evanum Peerappaduvaan; Avargal Meerudhalgal Perugi, Avargal Seerkedugal Adhigariththadhu.

7 ivaigalai Naan Unakku Mannippadhu Eppadi? Un Pillaigal Ennai Vittuvittu, Dheyvam Allaadhavaigalperil Aanaiyidugiraargal; Naan Thirupthiyaakkina Avargal Vibasaarampanni Vesiveettile Koottankoodugiraargal
8 avargal Kozhuththa Kudhiraigalaippol Kaalame Ezhumbi, Avanavan Thanthan Ayalaanudaiya Penjaadhiyin Pinnaale Kanaikkiraan.
9 ivaigalai Visaariyaadhiruppeno? Ippadippatta Jaadhikku En Aaththumaa Needhiyai Sarikkattaadhirukkumo Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.
10 adhin Madhilgalmeleri Azhiththuppodungal, Aanaalum Sarvasangaaram Seyyaadhirungal; Adhin Koththalangalai Idiththuppodungal; Avaigalkarththarudaiyavaigal Alla.
11 isravel Vamsaththaarum, Yoodhaa Vamsaththaarum Enakku Virodhamaai Migudhiyum Dhrogampanninaargal Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.
12 avar Appadippattavar Allavendrum, Pollaappu Nammel Varaadhu, Naam Pattayaththaiyaagilum, Panjaththaiyaagilum Kaanbadhillaiyendrum,
13 theerkkadharisigal Kaatraaippovaargal; Thiruvaakku Avargalil Illai; Avargalukke Appadi Aagakkadavadhendrum, Avargal Sollik Karththaraimarudhaliththaargal.

14 aagaiyaal Senaigalin Dhevanaagiya Karththar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal: Neengal Indha Vaarththaiyai Sonnapadiyinaal, Idho, Naan Un Vaayilitta En Vaarththaigalai Akkiniyum, Indha Janaththai Viragum Aakkuven, Adhu Ivargalaip Patchikkum.

15 isravel Vamsaththaare, Idho, Dhooraththilirundhu Naan Ungalmel Oru Jaadhiyaik Konduvaruven Endru Karththar Sollugiraar; Adhu Balaththa Jaadhi, Adhu Poorvakaalaththu Jaadhi, Avargal Nee Ariyaadha Baashaiyaip Pesum Jaadhi, Avargal Pesugiradhu Innadhendru Unakku Vilangaadhu.
16 thirandha Predhakkuzhigalaippol Avargal Ambaraaththoonigal Irukkum; Avargal Anaivarum Paraakkiramasaaligal.

17 avargal Un Kumaararum Un Kumaaraththigalum Saappidavendiya Un Vilaichchalaiyum Un Appaththaiyum Saappittu, Un Aadugalaiyum Un Maadugalaiyum Patchiththu, Un Dhraatchappazhangalaiyum Un Aththippazhangalaiyum Saappittu, Nee Nambina Unnudaiya Aranaana Pattanangalaip Pattayaththaale Verumaiyaakkuvaargal.
18 aagilum Naan Annaatkalilum Ungalai Sarvasangaaram Seyyaadhiruppen Endru Karththar Sollugiraar

19 engal Dhevanaagiya Karththar Engalukku Ivaigalaiyellaam Edhinimiththam Seydhaar Endru Neengal Kettaal, Appozhudhu Nee Avargalaip Paarththu Neengal Ennaivittu, Ungaludaiya Dhesaththile Anniya Dhevargalai Seviththadhupola, Ungaludaiyadhallaadha Dhesaththile Anniyargalai Sevippeergalendru Solvaayaaga.
20 neengal Yaakkobin Veettile Ariviththu, Yoodhaavile Sollik Kooravendiyadhu Ennavendraal,
21 kangal Irundhum Kaanaamalum, Kaadhugal Irundhum Kelaamalumirukkira Arivillaadha Janangale, Kelungal.

22 enakku Bayappadaadhiruppeergalo Endru Karththar Sollugiraar; Alaigal Modhiyadiththaalum Merkollaadhapadikkum, Avaigal Iraindhaalum Kadavaadhapadikkum, Kadakkak Koodaadha Niththiya Pramaanamaaga Samuththiraththin Manalai Ellaiyaai Vaiththirukkiravaraagiya Enakkumunbaaga Adhiraadhiruppeergalo?
23 indha Janangalo Murattaattamum Kalagamumaana Irudhayamullavargal; Murattaattampannip Poividugiraargal.

24 andhandhap Paruvaththile Engalukku Mazhaiyaiyum, Munmaariyaiyum Pinmaariyaiyum Koduththu, Aruppukku Niyamiththa Vaarangalai Engalukkuth Tharkaakkira Engal Dhevanaagiya Karththarukku Bayandhiruppom Endru Avargal Thangal Irudhayaththile Sollugiradhillai.
25 ungal Akkiramangal Ivaigalai Vilakki, Ungal Paavangal Ungalukku Nanmaiyai Varavottaadhirukkiradhu.
26 kuruvipidikkiravargal Padhungugiradhu Pol Padhungi, Manusharaip Pidikkak Kannigalai Vaikkira Dhunmaarkkar En Janangalil Kaanappadugiraargal.
27 kuruvigalaal Koondu Niraindhirukkiradhupol, Avargal Veedugal Kabadangalaal Niraindhirukkiradhu; Aadhalaal Avargal Perugi Aisuvariyavaangalaagiraargal.

28 kozhuththu, Salukkuppannugiraargal; Dhunmaarkkanudaiya Seyalgalaik Kandikkaamal Vidugiraargal; Thikkatravanudaiya Vazhakkai Visaariyaamal, Thaangalmaaththiram Vaazhugiraargal; Eliyavargalin Nyaayaththaith Theeraargal.
29 ivaigalai Visaariyaadhiruppeno? Ippadippatta Jaadhikku En Aaththumaa Needhiyai Sarikkattaadhirukkumo Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.
30 thigaiththuth Thidukkidaththakka Kaariyam Dhesaththile Nadandhuvarugiradhu.

31 theerkkadharisigal Kallaththeerkkadharisanam Sollugiraargal; Aasaariyargal Avargal Moolamaai Aalugiraargal; Ippadiyiruppadhu En Janaththukkup Piriyamaayirukkiradhu; Aanaalum Mudivile Ennaseyveergal?
